code:
%% Connection flowchart
flowchart TD
  subgraph Client[Groupware_IssueTracker]
    C1[Groupware_KanbanBoard]
    C2[Groupware_SprintBacklog]
    C3[Groupware_SprintBacklog]
    C4[Groupware_WikiPage]
    C5[Groupware_KanbanBoard]
  end

  subgraph Server[Groupware_WikiPage]
    S1[Groupware_SprintBacklog]
    S2{Groupware_IssueTracker}
    S3[Groupware_WikiPage]
    S4[Groupware_SprintBacklog]
    S5[Groupware_IssueTracker]
    S6[Groupware_KanbanBoard]
  end

  C1 --> C2 --> C3 --> S1
  S1 -->|invalid| Drop[Groupware_IssueTracker]
  S1 --> S2
  S2 -- yes --> S3 --> S4 --> C5
  S2 -- no --> S5

  C5 -- piggyback --> S1
  C5 -- no_outgoing --> ExplicitACK[Groupware_ChatRoom] --> S1
  C4 --> C3

  S6 --> Close[Groupware_KanbanBoard]
